english: South Lake (in Beijing’s imperial park); South China Sea; Nanhai

etymology.description: 南 (south) + 海 (sea; lake) = southern waters; also a named 'South Lake'.
etymology.interpretation: Combines a direction with a water-body noun to denote waters to the south or a toponym. Most often refers to the South China Sea; in Beijing it names the South Lake within Zhongnanhai, and it appears in place names like Nanhai District.

examples.chinese: 台风正向南海移动，渔船已回港避风(颱風正向南海移動，漁船已回港避風)。
examples.pinyin: Táifēng zhèng xiàng Nánhǎi yídòng, yúchuán yǐ huígǎng bìfēng.
examples.english: The typhoon is moving toward the South China Sea, and fishing boats have returned to harbor to take shelter.

examples.chinese: 这幅画描绘了北京中南海的南海景色(這幅畫描繪了北京中南海的南海景色)。
examples.pinyin: Zhè fú huà miáohuì le Běijīng Zhōngnánhǎi de Nánhǎi jǐngsè.
examples.english: This painting depicts the scenery of the South Lake in Beijing’s Zhongnanhai.

examples.chinese: 佛山的南海区产业发达，交通便利(佛山的南海區產業發達，交通便利)。
examples.pinyin: Fóshān de Nánhǎi Qū chǎnyè fādá, jiāotōng biànlì.
examples.english: Nanhai District in Foshan has a developed industry and convenient transportation.
